name: simple-icons
title: Brand Icons - simpleicons.org
description: Browse, Search, and Copy 3300+ popular brand icons from Simple Icons.
author: litomore

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Brand Icons
commands.description: Browse, search, and copy 3300+ SVG icons for popular brands from Simple Icons

preferences.name: githubToken
preferences.title: GitHub Token (optional)
preferences.description: GitHub token for accessing GitHub API. It's optional, but it's recommended to provide it to avoid rate limiting if you use the extension frequently.

preferences.name: releaseVersion
preferences.title: Release Version
preferences.description: This field is used to specify the release version of the npm package. It is used to download the asset pack from npm. You can use a versioned release (e.g. `simple-icons@14`) or a tag (e.g. `latest`). If you leave it empty, the extension will use the latest version of the package.

preferences.name: defaultDetailAction
preferences.title: Default detail action
preferences.description: The default action when viewing detail of an item

preferences.name: defaultLoadSvgAction
preferences.title: Default action for copying/opening SVG
preferences.description: The default action when copying/opening SVG

preferences.name: displaySimpleIconsFontFeatures
preferences.title: Display Simple Icons Font Features
preferences.label: Enabled
preferences.description: Display Simple Icons Font Features, such as font Copy Character, Copy HTML Code, and Copy UTF Code
